subject: Re: [junit] Cannot get value of hidden parameter
msgSnippet: ... Sounds odd. Does the parameter name show up in form.getParameterNames()? If so, can you pass the matching result from this array to getParameterValue and
messageBody:
On Tue, 14 Dec 2004 11:11:37 +1100, pam withnall <pwithnall@...> wrote:
>
> HI,
> I'm using HTTP Unit and cannot get the value from a hidden form
> parameter
> like a <INPUT type="hidden" name="blah" value="blah">
>
> form.isHiddenParameter("blah") returns True
> While form.getParameterValue("blah") returns an empty string, when the
> parameter has a value.

Sounds odd. Does the parameter name show up in
form.getParameterNames()? If so, can you pass the matching result from
this array to getParameterValue and get a different result? Maybe your
parameter name actually has a non-printing character in it.
